name: Glazed Lemon Blueberry Muffins
author: SunnyDaysNora
summary: Sweet, slightly tart, wonderful! The lemon glaze on these blueberry muffins really puts them over the top!
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Line two 12-cup muffin tins with paper liners
Stir flour, sugar, 1 tablespoon lemon zest, baking soda, salt, and nutmeg together in a large bowl
Whisk buttermilk, oil, eggs, lemon juice, and vanilla extract together in a medium bowl
Stir into the flour mixture until just moistened
Spoon batter into muffin cups, filling them about 3/4 full
Bake in the preheated oven until tops spring back when lightly pressed, 20 to 25 minutes
Transfer muffins onto a wire rack to cool for about 15 minutes
Meanwhile, combine confectioners' sugar, butter, hot water, vanilla extract, and remaining zest in a medium bowl
Dip cooled muffin tops in glaze
Cool until glaze firms up, about 10 minutes
